articles.description: Sia's "Music" – which received two Golden Globe nominations – will now include a disclaimer before it starts amid backlash from the autism community.
articles.content:
USA TODAY film critic Brian Truitt explains why "Da 5 Bloods" and Tom Hanks' role in "News of the World" were snubbed for Golden Globe nominations.
USA TODAY

articles.author: Lisa Respers France, CNN
articles.title: Morgan Wallen apologizes for racial slur as backlash grows - CNN
articles.description: Morgan Wallen is apologizing after a video surfaced in which he reportedly used a racial slur and profanities.
